basics.name: Roshan Raj Chaudhary
basics.label: Game Designer & Web Developer
basics.summary: I'm a web developer creating immersive experiences with innovative interfaces, and I design games as a hobby. Let's create something amazing together!

work.name: Self Employed
work.summary: Independent professional with versatile expertise, achieving high-quality results in remote projects via a client-first methodology and efficient task coordination.
highlights: Successfully managed diverse projects, delivering exceptional results through a client-centric approach and proficient remote collaboration.
achievements: Successfully coordinated diverse projects, ensuring excellent outcomes by maintaining a client-first mindset and proficient remote teamwork.
Received numerous positive testimonials and referrals, contributing to a growing client base.

work.name: Flora Services
work.summary: Experienced in drafting and typing legal documents in the land management sector.
highlights: Proficient in Nepali typing, enhancing communication and document preparation efficiency
responsibilities: Focused on the creation and typing of various legal documents related to land and land management.
Worked closely with a lawyer to prepare various legal documents related to land and land management, ensuring accuracy and compliance with relevant regulations.

work.name: Tamang Lekhapadhi
work.summary: Efficiently supported office operations, enhancing communication and document preparation efficiency with proficient Nepali typing skills.
highlights: Efficiently managed office tasks, communication, and document preparation, enhancing overall productivity.
responsibilities: Prepare, format, and file documents, ensuring accuracy and professionalism.
Greet and assist visitors, providing excellent customer service and addressing inquiries.
Keep track of office supplies and place orders when necessary to ensure the smooth operation of office activities.

work.name: Hamro Motorcycle Workshop
work.summary: Assisted senior technicians in motorcycle repair, maintenance, and customer service, gaining hands-on experience and technical skills in a dynamic workshop environment.
highlights: Hands-on experience in motorcycle repair, maintenance, and customer service within a dynamic workshop environment.
responsibilities: Gain practical experience in motorcycle repair and maintenance.
Assist customers with inquiries, provide updates on repair status, and help with vehicle pick-up and drop-off.
Help senior technicians with tasks such as diagnosing issues, performing repairs, and conducting routine maintenance.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

projects.name: Video Editor Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing video editing projects and services.
highlights: Built with Plain HTML, CSS and JS.
Includes video samples and past projects.
Contact page with a form for inquiries.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio & Blog
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website and blog built with Astro.

Newsletter integration for staying connected with visitors
